description:
The Bagra Army has been forcing the Digimon of the Magma Zone to search for the Zone`s Code Crown. Taiki fights to rescue them, but he`s met by a Digimon of overwhelming power, AncientVolcamon! Taiki and his companions let themselves be arrested to find out where the prison is, and team up with the prisoners to attempt an escape. However, when the Bagra Army`s leader Tactimon hears that Taiki and Dorulumon have been captured, he appears to confirm the story personally - and tells Taiki`s team all about Dorulumon`s past...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Fierce General Tactimon Closes In!
猛将タクティモン, 迫る!
